heading: This Afternoon
text: Light snow, mainly south and west.
temperature: Mid teens to lower 20s, some mid 20s in the Hudson Valley

heading: Tonight
text: Snow likley early, then tapering off from west to east.
temperature: Teens, some single digits far north

heading: Tuesday
text: Chance of late-day snow showers, mainly west.

heading: Wednesday
text: Snow northeast, a wintry mix southwest, tapering off.
